 2012-14812012-11-02,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment to the position of special advisor to the Prime Minister, KEVIN S. MACLEOD, of Ottawa, Ontario, as Canadian Secretary to The Queen, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six years, on a full-time basis, effective January 7, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
